          <title>
            <string language="de">Europa während der Eiszeit</string>
            <string language="en">Europe during the ice age</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Europe pendant la période glaciaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Europa durante a idade de gelo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Europa durante l'età di ghiaccio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ευρώπη κατά τη διάρκεια της ηλικίας πάγου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Europa durante la edad de hielo</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Arbeitsblatt zur Verortung der maximalen Ausdehnung der Eismassen in Europa.</string>
            <string language="en">Worksheet on the maximum expansion of the ice masses in Europe. Fill in the line.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Eiszeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Europa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Ice age</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le tableau sur l'expansion maximum de la glace 
amasse en Europe. Complétez la ligne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A folha na expansão máxima do gelo reune-se em 
Europa. Preencha a linha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il foglio di lavoro sull'espansione massima del 
ghiaccio si ammassa in Europa. Riempa la riga.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας στη μέγιστη επέκταση των μαζών πάγου 
στην Ευρώπη. Συμπληρώστε τη γραμμή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La hoja de trabajo en la extensión máxima del 
hielo se forma en Europa. Complete la línea.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Période glaciaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Europe</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Idade de gelo</string>
